attributes.action: Petition for the Knighthood of Jeremy Monteith
attributes.additional_details:
Who: Jeremy Montieth, a great American young man.
What:  Please consider Jeremy Montieth for knighthood.
Why: It's his birthday.
How has he been in the service of Her Majesty the Queen: I've heard he likes "fish & chips."
Additional information in support of this nomination: Jeremy loves Jesus, he has a vast knowledge of Seinfeld, he is a gifted percussionist, you must admit "Sir Jeremy Montieth" sounds terrific, and most importantly, it is useless to deny this request because Jeremy always gets his.
